p: Parameter values (ranges) for this scenario are given in Tables 3, 4 and 5. The model was run for 27 years, thereby modelling three El Ni√±o events (years 1, 11 and 21) allowing the model to reach quasi-equilibrium conditions and generating output six years after the last ENSO, which could be compared with the observations made during the field studies [ 17, 22].
